title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Toolbar pushback - version 1.4
description:
In this video we will have a look at the Toolbar Pushback created by AmbitiousPilots and is available for free on flightsim.to. The tool has been updated recently and now contains a functionality to plan your pushback. Using this functionality the pushback truck will automatically pushback the airplane in the correct direction while you can concentrate on going to the checklist.

If you would like to try Toolbar Pushback yourself download it from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/15033/toolbar-pushback

Toolbar pushback now allows you to preplan the pushback
